name: Erfigardr (Demo)
description:
A young woman is stricken with an ancient disease. 

The only one who can cure her is a powerful being, nowhere near where the humans reside. 

She’ll have to travel to different lands to reach her destination, including the terrifying Erfigarðr, home to Orcs.

FEATURES: 

Immersive SFX and moving musical tracks

Beautifully illustrated sprites and settings

A compelling story-line

The bare-bones demo (placeholder art) plays the first few scenes, less than half an hour of gameplay. 

Credits:

Character Art= Genki + ALU

BGs= Minikle

BGM= Vindsvept (https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCfSUheoljDlGDjerRylO4Nw)
